data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_706573f138055c3df3df94948b4f26bd.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Lylia gets power from Gloom, increasing her Movement Speed by 15%. Each Gloom upgrade further increases this bonus by 5%.
Gloom gains an upgrade every time he devours Shadow Energy, up to 5 times. Gloom upgrade increases the detonation damage of Shadow Energy.

Lylia sends out Gloom with a shockwave, dealing 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in a line and slowing them by 30% for 1.5s.
If Gloom touches Shadow Energy, he will devour and detonate it.

Lylia condenses Shadow Energy at the target location, dealing 90<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 80%.

Shadow Energy can be detonated by Gloom's devour, dealing 220<font color="62f8fe"> (+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the enemies nearby. Each Gloom upgrade increases the detonation damage by 30%, up to 120%.

A max level Gloom will restore 50% of Shadow Energy's Recharge Time when it hits an enemy hero.

Lylia starts with the Shadow Energy skill.
Lylia returns to the Black Shoes' location 4s ago and restores her HP and Mana to the previous state, and an extra 10% Max HP. She also gains 20% extra Movement Speed for 2s.

data.name: Lylia

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Mid Lane: Stack CD Reduction to spam skills. Strong with good positioning.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+30 Magic Power
+5% Cooldown Reduction
+8 Magic Penetration

emblemskill.skilldesc: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Equipment can be purchased at <%Num1> of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage greater than <%Num3> of an enemy hero's Max HP <Num2> times within <Num1>s will scorch the target for an additional <Num5> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num6>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+50 Magic Power
+250 Extra Max HP
+20% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Ice Bound: When a skill deals damage to an enemy hero, it will also slow them by 10% for 2s (stacks up to 3 times). This effect has a 1s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ice Bound: When a skill deals damage to an enemy hero, it will also slow them by 10% for 2s (stacks up to 3 times). This effect has a 1s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+75 Magic Power
+10% Spell Vamp
+300 Extra Max HP
+7% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Butterfly Goddess: For every 800 Magic Damage dealt to an enemy hero (calculated before Damage Reduction), a Butterfly Goddess is summoned to attack the enemy hero, dealing Magic Damage equal to 10% of their current HP.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Butterfly Goddess: For every 800 Magic Damage dealt to an enemy hero (calculated before Damage Reduction), a Butterfly Goddess is summoned to attack the enemy hero, dealing Magic Damage equal to 10% of their current HP.
equiplist.equiptips:
+75 Magic Power
+400 Mana
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Scorch: Dealing Magic Damage burns the targets for 3s, also dealing extra Magic Damage equal to 1% of the target's Max HP per second.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Scorch: Dealing Magic Damage burns the targets for 3s, also dealing extra Magic Damage equal to 1% of the target's Max HP per second.
Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+75 Magic Power
+400 Extra Max HP
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40% Magic Penetration
+60 Magic Power

recommendmasterplan.name: SAYORI
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: A funny and witted little witch.

assist.desc: Lylia excels in prolonged battles, and works well with heroes with strong CC, like Franco and Minotaur.

strong.desc: Lylia counters Tank heroes without Blink skills, such as Carmilla and Hylos, who cannot easily escape Gloom's AOE range and are more susceptible to Lylia's high sustained damage.

weak.desc: Since most of Lylia's damage comes from detonating her 2nd Skill, but setting up Gloom can be quite slow, nimble Assassins like Nolan and Ling counter Lylia as she'll have a tough time hitting them.
